backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing meeting session management, user profiles, panic events, audit logging, session recordings, and role-based access control with authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implemented features including syntax fixes, SPA structure, glassmorphic login, registration flow, dashboard navigation, and subscription-based feature locking.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend components including authentication, dashboard layout, visualizers, neural lab, and various UI components with their specific functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining colors for UI components, charts, and sidebar elements.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with PWA manifest, favicon, theme color, and Inter font preloading for the AXON SOVEREIGN application.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining AXON Remote as a standalone portrait-mode mobile app with icons and black theme.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component implementing SPA structure with auth/dashboard view toggling, QueryClient provider, and context providers for telemetry and ghost mode.
frontend/src/components/admin/AuditLogVi: Admin component displaying paginated audit logs with action filtering, CSV export functionality, and security event tracking table.
frontend/src/components/admin/SystemHeal: Displays backend system health metrics including cycles balance, heap/stable memory, and query/update call counts with color-coded status indicators and refresh functionality.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Biomet: Renders a radar chart showing five biometric stress metrics (executive stress, vocal stability, background noise, packet health, privacy score) with simulated real-time updates.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Emotio: Displays a stacked area chart tracking seven emotion types (joy, surprise, fear, disgust, anger, sadness, neutral) over time with toggleable legend items.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Global: Visualizes a world map with four global network nodes (San Francisco, London, Tokyo, Bangalore) showing animated pulse effects when nodes become active.
frontend/src/components/analytics/LiveTr: Shows a real-time area chart of network traffic data that updates every 3 seconds with a sliding window of 20 data points.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Meetin: Card component displaying meeting details including title, duration, participant count, sentiment score, cost, and optional summary.
Live counter that calculates meeting cost at ₹12.5/second with pause/resume functionality and displays cumulative cost.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Neural: Terminal-style log viewer displaying simulated real-time security events across four categories (ENCRYPT, PACKET, NEURAL, QUANTUM) with auto-scrolling.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Quantu: Displays a dashboard panel showing quantum encryption metrics including key rotation rate, quantum resistance level, lattice crypto status, and post-quantum readiness score with animated visualizations and color-coded indicators.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Recent: Renders a table of recent files with columns for name, security level, status, and owner, using color-coded badges to indicate security levels (High/Medium/Low) and file statuses (Active/Archived/Pending).
frontend/src/components/analytics/Sentim: Displays a real-time area chart tracking vocal stress and emotional tension metrics over time, updating every 3 seconds with simulated sentiment analysis data.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Speake: Shows a list of speakers with their vocal frequency ranges and activity levels, displaying each speaker with an icon, progress bar, and dynamically updating activity percentages.
frontend/src/components/analytics/System: Implements a terminal-style scrolling log display showing real-time system events across categories like encryption, authentication, network, and biometric operations with timestamps and auto-scrolling.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Threat: Presents a grid matrix of threat detection cells showing attack vectors (Phishing, Malware, DDoS, Zero-Day) across categories (Email, Network, Application, Endpoint) with color-coded severity levels and active threat indicators.
frontend/src/components/analytics/VoiceP: Displays a timeline visualization of speaker voice patterns with segments showing speaker activity, volume, and timing across a 5-minute period. Includes interactive segment selection and real-time playback indicator.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthPanel.t: Reusable authentication panel wrapper with tactical glass styling, scanline overlay effects, and AXON logo with click handler. Provides consistent layout for auth forms.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProtectedRo: Route guard component that checks session validity using local storage and redirects to login if inactive. Shows loading spinner during authentication check.
frontend/src/components/auth/RegisterVie: Registration form component with fields for full name, email, password, and password confirmation. Includes password visibility toggles and form validation.
frontend/src/components/auth/RoleProtect: Role-based access control component that verifies user permissions (admin/user) via API and redirects unauthorized users to dashboard. Shows loading state during verification.
Sign-in form with email/password inputs, remember-me checkbox, password visibility toggle, and social login buttons (Google/Facebook). Handles form submission and loading states.
frontend/src/components/auth/ThreeBackgr: Animated 3D background using Three.js with floating geometric shapes (cubes, spheres, torus) that rotate and float over a gradient backdrop. Provides visual depth for auth pages.
frontend/src/components/common/ActiveSta: Small status indicator component showing a pulsing green dot with tooltip displaying 'Status: Active'. Used to indicate live/active system status.
frontend/src/components/common/FeatureLo: Full-screen overlay that blocks access to premium features, displaying upgrade prompt for Shield tier subscription with pricing and navigation to subscriptions page.
frontend/src/components/common/HotkeysRe: Modal component that displays keyboard shortcuts organized by category with search functionality. Opens with '?' key and closes with 'Escape'.
frontend/src/components/common/MetricCar: Reusable card component for displaying metrics with an icon, title, value, and optional trend indicator (up/down arrow).
frontend/src/components/common/PrimaryCT: Styled button component with emerald gradient background, hover effects, and shadow animations for primary call-to-action elements.
frontend/src/components/common/SentinelP: Fixed floating panic button that triggers emergency protocol with confirmation dialog, terminates sessions, and navigates to sentinel dashboard.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Active: Card displaying team members with avatars and roles, allowing admins to revoke access with toast notifications.
Card component showing the current subscription plan (Sovereign Enterprise) with badge and description.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/AssetS: Card displaying protected assets value in INR currency that auto-increments every 2 seconds to simulate real-time updates.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Contro: Card with toggle switches for Neural Shield and Stealth Mode features, persisting state to sessionStorage and logging events via telemetry.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Global: Animated canvas visualization showing global node locations (NYC, London, Tokyo) with pulsing emerald dots and labels on a dark background.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/KPIMet: Grid of four metric cards displaying secured meetings count, active nodes, threats neutralized (with bar chart), and health score (with radial gauge).
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Neural: Card component with URL input and verification button for meeting links. Simulates verification with a 1.5s delay and shows verified state.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Overvi: Dashboard overview card displaying system security health (98%) as primary KPI, plus grouped metrics for network stats and team access with trend indicators.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Pricin: Three-tier pricing table (Free, Sovereign Core ₹299/mo, Global Shield ₹499/mo) with feature lists and subscription management using useSubscriptionTier hook.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Quantu: Card displaying quantum interlink status with mic standby, 14ms latency, and 12 participants metrics.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/QuickA: Card with ghost mode toggle and tactical exit button that clears session, Internet Identity, and navigates to login.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Securi: Card with Recharts line chart showing security traffic volume over the last 7 days with mock data.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Spectr: Card with animated canvas displaying sine wave spectral analysis visualization with stable signal indicator.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Synops: Card showing synopsis engine with spinning loader and 'awaiting verified intel link' message.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/TeamMa: Card displaying team members list with active/idle status indicators and revoke access functionality.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/TeamSt: Card showing team member names with active/idle status indicators using mock data.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Teleme: Displays a scrollable feed of telemetry events with color-coded types (success, warning, error) and timestamps, consuming events from TelemetryContext.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/VocalH: Renders a circular progress indicator showing vocal health score (98.4/100) with an SVG gradient ring and "Digital Twin" label.
frontend/src/components/dev/PerformanceO: Displays a toggleable FPS counter overlay (Ctrl+Shift+F) that measures frame rate using requestAnimationFrame and color-codes performance (green/yellow/red).
frontend/src/components/effects/BorderBe: Renders an animated gradient beam effect that travels diagonally across a component's border using CSS keyframe animations.
frontend/src/components/effects/Sovereig: Displays a 3D rotating orb with radial gradient, glow effects, and ripple animations on hover for neural core visualization.
frontend/src/components/errors/ErrorBoun: React error boundary component that catches errors and displays a fallback UI with error details and options to retry or return home.
frontend/src/components/layout/BentoCard: Wrapper card component with glassmorphism styling and optional BorderBeam animation effect for bento grid layouts.
frontend/src/components/layout/Dashboard: Main dashboard layout with sidebar navigation, user profile, subscription tier checks, mobile menu, and logout functionality. Includes navigation items for various dashboard sections with tier-based access control.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer component with four-column grid layout containing brand info, product links, resources, and legal links, plus social media icons in bottom bar.
frontend/src/components/MagneticButton.t: Button component with magnetic attraction effect that follows mouse position with configurable strength and smooth transitions.
frontend/src/components/mobile/Biometric: A biometric authentication component supporting fingerprint and face ID scanning modes with animated progress, haptic feedback, and simulated success/error states.
frontend/src/components/neural/AIMirrorS: Displays the readiness status of an AI voice proxy with visual indicators (checkmark or spinner) and descriptive messages.
frontend/src/components/neural/NeuralPro: A circular progress indicator with SVG gradient rendering that displays synthesis progress percentage.
frontend/src/components/neural/VocalDrop: A drag-and-drop file upload component for audio files that validates file types and displays uploaded audio file details.
frontend/src/components/neural/VoiceHeal: Displays voice quality metrics (pitch stability, clarity index, tone quality) with progress bars and gradient styling.
frontend/src/components/scheduling/Secur: A calendar-based booking interface for scheduling security audit calls with date selection, time slot picker, and confirmation.
frontend/src/components/security/DarkWeb: Monitors and displays dark web threats with filtering by type/severity, auto-generation of threat alerts, and CSV export functionality.
frontend/src/components/sentinel/Acousti: A grid of environment cards (office, jet, airport, etc.) that can be toggled active/inactive for acoustic masking scenarios.
frontend/src/components/sentinel/Environ: An audio mixer interface with volume sliders for eight different environmental soundscapes used for tactical audio masking.
Displays a grid of environment audio spoofing options (office, cafe, airport, etc.) with play/stop toggle buttons and visual feedback for the active environment.
frontend/src/components/sentinel/Hardwar: Provides buttons to trigger fake OS update screens (Windows 11 and macOS) in fullscreen overlay mode with a close button.
frontend/src/components/sentinel/PacketJ: Simulates network degradation with a slider to control jitter level, displaying calculated quality, latency, and packet loss metrics, with a Ctrl+Shift+L keyboard shortcut.
frontend/src/components/sentinel/PanicPr: Displays a fullscreen fake Windows update screen with progress bar and stores panic state in sessionStorage; dismissible via Ctrl+Shift+Q shortcut.
frontend/src/components/settings/Bandwid: Allows users to select bandwidth quality presets (low/medium/high/ultra) with live bandwidth meter visualization and savings calculation, persisting selection to localStorage.
frontend/src/components/sync/ConnectionL: Displays a scrollable terminal-style log of WebSocket connection events, including authentication, heartbeats, and Diffie-Hellman key exchanges with simulated periodic updates.
frontend/src/components/testimonials/Tes: Renders a testimonial card with avatar, name, title, 5-star rating, and quote text with hover effects.
frontend/src/components/transitions/Neur: Displays a fullscreen loading transition with AXON logo, progress bar, and neural scan animation that completes at 100% and calls onComplete callback.
frontend/src/components/transitions/Page: Simple wrapper component that applies a fade-in animation to its children for page transitions.
frontend/src/components/vault/IntelSessi: Displays a meeting log card with collapsible analysis (sentiment, cost) and transcript sections, showing session metadata like duration and participant count.
frontend/src/components/vault/Subscripti: Displays a subscription tier card with pricing, features list, and selection button. Supports free, core, and shield tiers with monthly/yearly pricing and visual selection state.
Manages subscription tier selection (free/core/shield) with monthly/yearly toggle, persists selection to localStorage, and displays three tier cards with feature lists.
Toggle switch component for switching between monthly and yearly billing periods with visual highlighting and 20% savings label.
frontend/src/components/video/VideoWelco: Fixed-position video widget with play/pause, minimize/maximize, and close controls. Shows operator briefing thumbnail with playback simulation.
frontend/src/components/visualizer/Netwo: 3D globe visualization using Three.js showing global network nodes with latency-based color coding and connection arcs between locations.
frontend/src/components/visualizer/Neura: Canvas-based real-time audio wave visualizer rendering animated sine waves with multiple frequencies and colors.
frontend/src/components/visualizer/Water: Canvas-based waterfall spectrogram that scrolls frequency bars downward over time, creating a cascading visualization of audio spectrum.
frontend/src/contexts/GhostModeContext.t: React context providing ghost mode state management with sessionStorage persistence and toggle functionality.
frontend/src/contexts/TelemetryContext.t: React context for logging and managing telemetry events with timestamps, types (info/success/warning/error), and a 50-event history limit.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages backend actor instances with Internet Identity authentication, handling anonymous and authenticated states.
frontend/src/hooks/useHapticFeedback.ts: Provides a hook for triggering haptic feedback (vibration) on supported devices with light, medium, and heavy intensity presets.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication for ICP, providing a React context and hook for login, logout, identity management, and authentication status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useKeyboardShortcut.t: Hook that listens for keyboard shortcut combinations and triggers a callback when all specified keys are pressed simultaneously.
frontend/src/hooks/useMousePosition.ts: Tracks mouse position relative to the center of a referenced HTML element, returning normalized x/y coordinates.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend operations including user profiles, roles, meeting logs, panic events, audit logs, session recordings, and system health metrics.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubscriptionTier.t: Manages subscription tier state (free/core/shield) with feature flags and localStorage persistence, providing tier-based access control for features like Neural Lab and Sentinel Protocol.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for theming (dark sidebar, light content), tactical glass effects, scanlines animations, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanel.tsx: Admin dashboard with tabs for user management, audit logs, and system health monitoring, displaying current user profile and role information.
frontend/src/pages/AnalyticsVault.tsx: Displays archived meeting logs in a grid layout with subscription tier information, showing loading states and empty states when no sessions exist.
frontend/src/pages/CommandCenter.tsx: Main dashboard page that displays KPI cards (QuantumInterlink, AssetShield, VocalHealth, QuickActions), a NeuralIngestInput component, and conditionally renders SpectralAnalysisCard based on subscription tier.
frontend/src/pages/DeviceSync.tsx: Device synchronization page that displays a QR code for mobile pairing and a connection log in a two-column bento grid layout.
frontend/src/pages/DevMetrics.tsx: Developer metrics dashboard displaying system health data including cycles balance, heap/stable memory usage with charts, and critical threshold alerts using Recharts for visualization.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Marketing landing page with hero section, feature grid showcasing security capabilities (Sentinel Protocol, Quantum Encryption, Neural Network, etc.), testimonials, and social media links.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Authentication page with sign-in/register views, form validation, loading states, and a hidden master bypass feature activated by triple-clicking the logo.
frontend/src/pages/MobileBiometric.tsx: Mobile-specific biometric authentication page with a back button and BiometricScanner component.
frontend/src/pages/NeuralLab.tsx: Voice cloning interface with persona specification textarea, vocal sample upload, neural synthesis progress tracking, voice health dashboard, and AI mirror status display.
frontend/src/pages/SentinelProtocol.tsx: Tactical countermeasures page featuring acoustic matrix, emergency panic button, environment mixer/spoofing, packet jitter simulator, and hardware mimicry controls, gated by subscription tier.
frontend/src/pages/Settings.tsx: Settings page containing the BandwidthOptimizer component for performance configuration.
frontend/src/pages/Subscriptions.tsx: Displays pricing tiers (Basic ₹299/month and Premium ₹499/month) with feature lists and subscription buttons that show toast notifications for simulated payment flow.
frontend/src/pages/TacticalRemote.tsx: Mobile command interface with large tactile buttons for panic mode, lag simulation, environment spoofing, and biometric scanning, using haptic feedback and toast notifications.
frontend/src/pages/TeamManagementPage.ts: Simple team management page that displays a header and renders the ActiveIdentitiesCard component for managing team members and access levels.
frontend/src/pages/UnifiedDashboard.tsx: Main dashboard with sidebar navigation, user profile display, subscription tier badges, and sections for command center, neural lab, sentinel protocol, device sync, and vault features.
frontend/src/utils/localStorageAuth.ts: Provides localStorage-based authentication with basic encryption/decryption, user registration, sign-in validation, and session management using keys like AXON_USERS, AXON_SESSION, and AXON_MASTER_USER.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence and cleanup capabilities.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with dark mode support, custom color palette using OKLCH color space (including sidebar, chart, and semantic colors), extended theme with custom animations (accordion), and typography/container-queries plugins.
project_state.json: Project state document for AXON SOVEREIGN SPA application defining architecture (auth/dashboard views, localStorage user data, glassmorphic design), features (5 dashboard sections, 3-tier subscription, waveform visualization, KPIs), and known syntax error issues causing blank screen.
